About Key Skills Phonics Mastery 2-3 (School Edition)
Provides a comprehensive presentation of phonics skills with activities that align to state standards, focusing on the alphabetic principle--the understanding that there is a predictable relationship between written letters and spoken sounds.

With a focus on learning and using the alphabetic principle--the understanding that there is a predictable relationship between written letters and spoken sounds -- Key Skills Phonics Mastery provides explicit instructional support for emergent readers as they:

# Solidify knowledge of the alphabet
# Understand letter-sound correspondences
# Blend sounds, segment words and build decoding skills
# Distinguish onsets and rimes in spoken and written words
# Develop knowledge of phonograms and base words
# Construct a foundation for reading and spelling words
# Easy to use student interface assists readers and non-readers
